bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Energy Efficiency Technology Evaluation of Electric Power Fittings
IEEE Guide for Energy Efficiency Technology Evaluation of Electric Power Fittings

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide describes the energy efficiency technology evaluation of electric power fittings. It is applicable to electric power fittings in direct contact with electric power conductors.
This guide describes the energy efficiency technology evaluation of electric power fittings. It is applicable to electric power fittings in direct contact with electric power conductors.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
